product_overview: IronShield protects structural metal from corrosion with a flexible, industrial-grade direct-to-metal film.

recommended_use.intro: Perfect for interior and exterior applications, including:
items: Protects metal structures, fences, and steel railings

application_system.label: Primer (if required)
application_system.purpose: Ensures optimal adhesion and corrosion resistance for metals.

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Builds final protective layer for durability.

thinner: Thinner: Clean potable water (max 10% dilution if required)
surface_preparation: Remove rust from metal; prime if required.
application: Use roller or floor pad. Allow full drying between coats.
storage_safety: Use PPE (gloves, mask, goggles) during application.
Keep out of reach of children.
Avoid inhalation of mist; ventilate during use.
In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with clean water.
